Package server.clustering

Class ClusterSet

java.lang.Object
server.clustering.ClusterSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, server.distance.ClusterDistance
class ClusterSet extends Object implements server.distance.ClusterDistance, Serializable
Classe ClusterSet implementa un insieme di cluster.
